events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I bought last week because they do not work properly and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been identified as a refund request relating to a faulty product reported by the customer.
The case is now assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refunds to handle the request.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and any details about the issue?
To proceed with your refund, could you confirm when you received the headphones and describe the problem you are experiencing?
I received the headphones three days ago and they stopped working after just one use. The sound cuts out intermittently, making them unusable.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can offer you a full refund once you return the item or we can send you a replacement free of charge. Which option do you prefer?
Thank you for the quick response. I would prefer to receive a refund as soon as possible.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please use the prepaid label we will send via email to return your headphones.
We are checking in to confirm that you received the prepaid return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and I have sent the headphones back today. Thank you for your help!
The case has been closed following confirmation of the returned product and completed refund transaction.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about our refund process and your customer service experience.
